trans-unit.source: Displays a block featuring your store's newest products.
trans-unit.target: Afiseaza un bloc cu cele mai noi produse.

trans-unit.source: Please complete the "products to display" field.
Define the number of products to be displayed in this block.
trans-unit.target: Defineste numarul de produse afisate in acest bloc.

trans-unit.source: Number of days for which the product is considered 'new'
trans-unit.target: Numarul de zile pentru care produsul este considerat 'nou'

trans-unit.source: Highlight your store's newest products, display a block on the homepage and let the visitors know about your latest news.
trans-unit.target: Evidentiaza cele mai noi produse ale magazinului tau prin afisarea unui bloc pe pagina principala.
